title: Origo Workshop
description: Conducted a two-day hands-on workshop introducing robotics for B23 students of NIT Calicut.

title: IInvenTiv mega R&D fair
description: Two projects were selected from NIT, out of which one was from RIG. This project was presented in front of the Hon'ble education minister of India.

title: UL space club lecture
description: Conducted a one-day lecture on robotics followed by a mini expo for school students in UL Cyber Park.

title: KTX Expo
description: Showcased AVIBOT, one of RIG's flagship projects, at the KTX Global, aiming to attract industry partnerships to make the product market-ready.

title: Disha Expo
description: Represented NIT Calicut at Disha Expo'23, showcasing a few RIG projects to higher secondary school students.

title: Lab Visits
description: Held several lab visits for school students, showcasing robotic technologies and ongoing projects in RIG.
